summary: Hyperscalers (Microsoft, Google, Meta, AWS) have all announced aggressive increases in AI-related Capex for 2024/2025, signaling strong continued investment in AI infrastructure. Current H100/A100 rental prices remain high at $3.19/hr, indicating sustained demand exceeding supply. No major new model releases (e.g., GPT-5, Gemini 2) are confirmed at this time.
